documents.document: If there is no struggle, there is no progress. (Frederick Douglass)
RT @HumanityNeeds: More revolutionary strength, less capitalist fetishes
I'm a human being first and foremost, and as such I am for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole.(Malcolm X)
I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it's for or against. (Malcolm X)
RT @OvertDictionary: The Revolution: a true revolution does not create a new class of elites, it simply wipes out hints of elitism.
The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.(Camus)
Imperialism leaves behind germs of rot which we must clinically detect and remove from our land but from our minds as well.(Fanon)
RT @OvertDictionary: Mass Culture: a culture tailored and crafted by the elite ideology then fed to the hungry masses.
There are decades where nothing happens; And there are weeks where decades happen. (V.I. Lenin)
RT @AIbertCamus: Language must be used to inspire the audience never to indulge the author's literary desires.
"How beautiful! It's the revolution!" Ernest Mandel
By surrendering my life to the revolution, I found eternal life. (Huey P. Newton)
RT @YgamblingSucks: Gambling is an institution that solicits feelings of money-worship.
By rejecting the love of one, I received the love of all. (Huey P. Newton)
By having no possessions, I have possessed all. (Huey P. Newton)
RT @HowAdsBrainwash: by making you long for stuff instead of deep social relations.
By having no family, I inherited the family of humanity. (Huey P. Newton)

RT @OvertDictionary: Weapons Scientists: well paid professional who use exotic vacations to cover up their guilty conscience.

What is a rebel? A man who says no. ~Albert Camus

RT @Rosa__Luxemburg: Salvation through revolutionization!
In general, the vitality and relative dignity of an animal can be measured by the intensity of its instinct to revolt. ~Mikhail Bakunin
To revolt is a natural tendency of life. Even a worm turns against the foot that crushes it. ~Bakunin

Revolution begins with the self, in the self. - TONI CADE BAMBARA
Our homeland is the whole world. Our law is liberty. We have but one thought, revolution in our hearts. - DARIO FO

This is a revolution, damnit! We're going to have to offend somebody! - PETER STONE
You can jail a Revolutionary, but you can't jail the Revolution. - HUEY NEWTON

When dictatorship is a fact, revolution becomes a right. - VICTOR HUGO

Destroy everything. Don't build on the past. There is no past. - JOHN CORIGLIANO
I have the people behind me and the people are my strength. - HUEY NEWTON
The history of the human race always has been, and most likely always will be, that of revolution. - LEWIS F. KORNS

In order to conquer, what we need is to dare, still to dare, and always to dare. - Georges Jacques Danton

RT @How2SpotTraitor: Traitors to the left tend to be extremely volatile, emotional, absurdly sentimental.
'So early in my life, I had learned that if you want something, you had better make some noise.' - Malcolm X
Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around. - Thoreau

Aim above morality. Be not simply good, be good for something. - Thoreau

While there is a lower class, I am in it, while there is a criminal element, I am of it, while there is a soul in prison I am not free. Debs
I have no country to fight for; my country is the earth, and I am a citizen of the world - Eugene V. Debs
We are certain that we are invincible, if humanity will not emerge from this imperialistic massacre broken in spirit it will triumph. -Lenin

I hate victims who respect their executioners. ~Jean-Paul Sartre
